meditations.title: Intro to Meditating
meditations.description: This is an intro to meditations. It will help you learn what it means to meditate and dive into deep breathing excersies.

meditations.title: Good Mornings
meditations.description: Wake up and meditate. Fuel your mornings with breathing excersises and how you want to tackle your day.

meditations.title: Relieve your Stress
meditations.description: Need some time to sit back? Relax? Meditation is a great way to deal with stress and allowing yourself to slow down.

meditations.title: Take some time to Breathe
meditations.description: Short excersise to help you learn breathing excersies. This is recommended during the mid-day.

meditations.title: Body Scan
meditations.description: Losing focus? Body Scanning is a great form of meditation to help you ease back into focus. Allowing yourself to learn more about your breathe-work.

meditations.title: Sleep Meditations
meditations.description: Finally. Made it through the day. Take this time to set yourself up to sleep soundingly. Allow yourself to reflect and appreciate what you did for yourself today.

meditations.title: Slow Water
meditations.description: Sounds that'll help you ease into meditation. Sometimes we need to feel like we're in a different place to focus.

meditations.title: Relaxing Rain
meditations.description: Sounds that'll help you ease into meditation. Sometimes we need to feel like we're in a different place to focus.
meditations.audio: ../assets/Heavy Rain Sound And Thunder Natural Sounds Relaxing Sleep.mp3
